short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the productivity of new tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prismum: Transform Your Browser into a Productivity Powerhouse

Elevate your browsing experience with Prismum, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to boost your productivity and infuse each day with inspiration. Experience breathtaking visuals on every new tab, turning mundane browsing into an artistic journey. Stay on top of tasks with an integrated to-do list and daily mission feature, ensuring you never lose sight of your goals. Access news and searches instantly, and get personalized daily horoscope insights for an extra motivational boost. Enjoy seamless multi-language support and a customizable dashboard to make your browsing experience uniquely yours. With Prismum, every tab opens a world of possibilities, blending functionality with creativity. Add Prismum to Chrome now and revolutionize the way you browse!
